DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the non-inferiority of Belotero® Basic versus Juvéderm® Ultra 3 in the treatment of nasolabial folds
DOC.brief_title: Non-inferiority of Belotero® Basic Versus Juvéderm® Ultra 3
DOC.criteria: Subject with bilateral, symmetrical NLF and wish for correction. Documented severity of NLF score 2 or 3 at screening on the Merz Wrinkle Severity Rating Scale II Any severe or uncontrolled systemic disease (e.g. cardiac, renal, pulmonary, hepatic, or gastrointestinal). Subject suffering from diabetes mellitus, autoimmune and rheumatic diseases, clinically relevant coagulation disorders, recurrent angina, or severe psychic, neurological or mental disease History of malignancy within the last 5 years before the study Infection, inflammations or active dermatological disease in the face
